entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Clearing this evening. Wind west 30 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 21. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EDT Monday 27 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 17.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 18.
